meanings.sent1: The leaves turned a brownish color in the fall.
meanings.sent2: Her hair had a brownish tint to it.
meanings.sent3: The brownish squirrel tried to blend in with the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: The old book had a brownish cover, worn from years of use.
meanings.sent5: The brownish mud on the trail made it hard to see where to step.

meanings.sent1: The sky had a brownish hue as the sun set.
meanings.sent2: The river water looked brownish after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent3: The brownish paint on the walls gave the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent4: The brownish clouds signaled an approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: The brownish soil was perfect for growing vegetables in the garden.
